name: Skript Studio
description: An online code editor made for Skript with built-in syntax highlighting, syntax autocomplete, and obfuscator.

name: Roblox FPS Unlocker Auto Updater
description: An application that automatically updates Roblox FPS Unlocker from axstin/rbxfpsunlocker, whenever a new version is found available.

name: CubedCraft File Uploader
description: An open-source application made to simplify the complex process of server developments in CubedCraft. Automatically sync server files with local working directory when changes are applied.
